artist: Artist: Wadsworth Jarrell; Publisher: Wadsworth Jarrell
creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: psychedelic-style portrait of African American political activist Angela Davis; colorful image of figure in profile, yelling into microphone; image is formed by words in yellow, red, magenta, purple, orange, and blue
signed: Signed in pencil, LRC: Wadsworth Jarrell | printed in yellow, LRC: Wadsworth Jarrell
title: Revolutionary (Angela Davis)
